entry.tran: 往(或在)城外;往(或在)城镇的非商业区
entry.def: If you go uptown, or go to a place uptown, you go away from the centre of a town or city towards the edge. Uptown sometimes refers to a part of the city other than the main business district.

example.ex: He rode uptown and made his way to Bob's apartment...
example.tran: 他乘车前往城外鲍勃的公寓。

means.word_mean: 1. a residential part of town away from the central commercial district
1. of or located in the upper part of a town;
1. toward or in the upper part of town
